example.name: beam-caution
example.description: Demonstration of how to indicate a cautionary accidental. The first subexample has an E-flat at the end of the second measure, but there is no accidental displayed since it is contained in the key signature. The second subexample displays the flat, which is not technically required, but is provided for clarity to the performer.

file.name: caution.ai
file.description: Adobe Illustrator CS3 file containing example. Equivalent to PDF file.

file.name: caution.mus
file.description: SCORE file used to create example

file.name: description.txt
file.description: this file in plain text format
